mapper.sql: Id , UserId , CompanyId , Name , Href , PicUrl , UserBy, Type , IsOpenly , Pwd , PlayAmount , InsertBy , InsertDate , UpdateBy , UpdateDate , Remarks , DelFlag
mapper.select: SELECT FROM gg_jokesg WHERE Id = #{id} AND DelFlag = 1
SELECT FROM gg_jokesg WHERE UserId = #{userId} AND DelFlag = 1 ORDER BY UpdateDate DESC
SELECT FROM ( SELECT FROM gg_jokesg WHERE DelFlag = '1' AND IsOpenly = '1' ORDER BY InsertDate desc LIMIT 100 ) newest ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 8
SELECT FROM ( SELECT FROM gg_jokesg WHERE DelFlag = '1' AND IsOpenly = '1' ORDER BY PlayAmount DESC LIMIT 10 ) hot ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 8
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gg_jokesg ( Id, UserId, CompanyId, Name, Href, PicUrl, UserBy, Type, IsOpenly, Pwd, PlayAmount, InsertBy, InsertDate, UpdateBy, UpdateDate, Remarks, DelFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{companyId}, #{name}, #{href}, #{picUrl}, #{userBy}, #{type}, #{isOpenly}, #{pwd}, #{playAmount}, #{insertBy}, #{insertDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gg_jokesg SET DelFlag = '0' WHERE Id = #{id}

UPDATE gg_jokesg SET
Name = #{name },
PicUrl = #{picUrl },
IsOpenly = #{isOpenly },
Pwd = #{pwd },
UpdateBy = #{updateBy }, UpdateDate = #{updateDate },
Remarks = #{remarks }
WHERE Id = #{id}
UPDATE gg_jokesg SET PlayAmount = (PlayAmount+1) where Id = #{id}
